Detailed Description

Definition at line 86 of file gateway.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

RODOS::Gateway::Gateway ( Linkinterface *  linkinterface_,
bool  forwardall_ = false,
bool  enable_ = true 
)

At creation time a connection to the corresponding topic and putter (receiver) has to be done. Subscriber may be "Normal" message receiver or may be gateways. Gateways are interfaces to other memory spaces and nodes, example going through a network. Gateways just forward messages to other nodes.

The param linkinterface is an object which shall be used to access the hardware of the link interface to the network.

Parameters:
linkinterface_instance of linking interface to either UDP or UART
forwardall_flag whether to send messages for all or only selected topics
enableflag whether this gateway should send localy published topics to the network, disable if using routers to do this

) [private, virtual]

Transfer messages from the local network to the external network.

Parameters:
[out]topicIdID of sending topic
[out]lenlength of message to send (size of topic type)
[out]datapointer to data field (type) of message
Returns:
number of receivers message is sent to, always 1

void RODOS::Gateway::resetTopicsToForward ( )
void RODOS::Gateway::run ( ) [virtual]

Entry point for user code. The thread activities shall implement by overloading this method.

Implements RODOS::Thread.

void RODOS::Gateway::sendNetworkMessage ( NetworkMessage &  msg)

Send out msg over this Gateways LinkInterface. Send Is used by the Gateway itsself and may be used by external modules like Routers.

void RODOS::Gateway::setForwardAllTopics ( bool  forwardall = true)

In worst case you may forward all topics. Say true/false. If you can not write to the topic list with setTopicsToForwarded then you might use this by triggering the flag.

void RODOS::Gateway::setTopicsToForward ( void *  topicList)

For Simple networks, the list of topics which shall be forwarded to the network has to be known in the local node. This list has to be passed to the gateway using setTopicsToForward(...) Intelligent networks (for example the implementation using UDP) the network provides this list and the receiver thread will call this method for arrived messages with topic 0 (list report).

bool RODOS::Gateway::shouldTopicForwarded ( long  topicId) [inline]

Definition at line 155 of file gateway.h.

References externalsubscribers, RODOS::TopicListReport::find(), and forwardAll.

Member Data Documentation

TopicListReport RODOS::Gateway::externalsubscribers [private]

List of topics, which shall be forwarded to the external network. For simple networks this could be a constant list. For intelligent networks (e.g. using UDP-networks) this list can be provided by the networks using topic-id 0.

bool RODOS::Gateway::forwardAll [private]

If set true, forces me to forward ALL messages, otherwise only for topics listed
